metadata.purpose: Comprehensive analysis of screenshots without PlantUML sources to identify misplacement and provide recommendations

5-agent-patterns.issue: Referenced but image file doesn't exist
5-agent-patterns.recommendation: Either create PlantUML diagram showing the 5 agentic patterns (Reflection, Tool Use, Planning, ReAct, Multi-Agent) or find the original from Andrew Ng's content

agent-core-components.issue: Generic diagram name doesn't clearly indicate what components are shown
agent-core-components.recommendation: Create PlantUML showing: Memory, Tools, LLM Interface, Control Flow, State Management

coder_platform_ui.description: Screenshots from Coder platform documentation showing UI and architecture
coder_platform_ui.proper_context: These show the actual Coder platform interface and deployment architecture

agentic_patterns.description: Conceptual diagrams showing the five agentic patterns
agentic_patterns.recommendation: Create unified PlantUML diagram showing all 5 patterns with proper relationships
agentic_patterns.proper_context: Should illustrate: Reflection (self-critique loop), Tool Use (function calling), Planning (task decomposition), ReAct (reasoning + acting), Multi-Agent (collaboration)
agentic_patterns.suggested_caption: The Five Core Agentic Design Patterns for LLM Applications

rag_diagrams.description: RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) architecture and evolution
rag_diagrams.likely_source: Various RAG research papers and articles, possibly from papers like 'Retrieval-Augmented Generation for Knowledge-Intensive NLP Tasks'
rag_diagrams.recommendation: Create consistent PlantUML diagrams for RAG concepts
rag_diagrams.proper_context: Should show: Vector DB, Embedding Model, Retrieval Pipeline, Context Injection, LLM Generation
rag_diagrams.issues: Multiple overlapping RAG diagrams causing confusion

mcp_protocol.description: Model Context Protocol diagrams and inspector tools
mcp_protocol.recommendation: Some have PlantUML versions, verify consistency
mcp_protocol.proper_context: MCP enables standardized LLM-tool communication protocol

langchain.recommendation: Should be in Session 2, consider SVG version

agent-frameworks-overview.recommendation: Create comprehensive PlantUML showing all frameworks covered

session9-overview.recommendation: Create PlantUML showing multi-agent coordination patterns

immediate_actions: Create PlantUML for '5-agent-patterns' showing all five patterns clearly
Create PlantUML for 'agent-core-components' with proper labeling
Consolidate multiple RAG diagrams into one comprehensive PlantUML
content_improvements: Add proper captions explaining what each diagram shows
Ensure diagrams are placed in the correct session/context
Create consistent style across all PlantUML diagrams
missing_attributions: Andrew Ng's agentic patterns content needs attribution
Framework diagrams should reference official documentation
